parameters: \~Wasn't there an exit to the village around here?
\~I'm afraid I don't know what you mean, \.my dear.

"Are we sealed in somehow? Where did the paths back to
the forest go?"
\~Rain's coming. \|I feel it in my knees.
\~I'm positive that there was a path here.
\~Look at these cabbages! \|Best harvest in years!
\~Weren't there less trees over there last night?
\~There's something weird about this place. \|We should
split up and take a look around.
\~Sabas and I will explore the perimeter of the village. \|
Mezatrix, \.you talk with the locals and see what they
know. \|Come check in with me when you've spoken with
\~How are you coming along with questioning the
very helpful. \|Apparently this place is called "Old
\~\n[4] and I have been trying to find a way out of the
\~The entire place is surrounded by trees. \|There aren't
any gaps wide enough to squeeze through.
\~I even tried cutting a tree down, \.but the bark healed
\~It's like the forest wants to keep us here.
\~I think I still have people to talk to.
(There was a wide path here when we first found Old
Creek. \|Somehow it completely sealed up overnight.)
(\n[2] said she tried cutting her way through, \.but can
I trust her? \|She's the one who brought us into the
(Maybe she's an agent of whatever dark power is keeping
us here. \|If I got rid of her there's a chance\^
\~\n[3]? \|What are you doing out here so late?
\~Still hoping to find a way out, \.huh? \|I don't blame
\~Why are you looking at me like that?
\~It-\.it's been you the whole time, \.hasn't it? \|You're
the one who's been keeping us here!
\~What? \|That's crazy. \|I want out of here just as much
\~Sure doesn't seem like it. \|You're spending more time
farming cabbages than you are trying to escape.
\~I'm just trying to make the best of the situation. \|If
we're stuck here, \.we might as well be comfortable.
\~Besides, \.\n[4] and I already confirmed that we can't
cut our way out. \|The trees heal up right way,
\~Yes. \|But please understand that I'm doing it for
\~This village is perfect. \|It's the most peaceful place
I've ever seen. \|I've felt never more happy than I do
\~I know you feel the same way.
\~But it's not real. \|Can't you see that? \|There's no way
a place this perfect can exist. \|In my experience, \.
\~And what about your mission? \|If you don't repair the
\~I'm ... \|I'm sure they can manage. \|The rest of the
world gets along fine without growing crops in the
\~If you won't let us out, \.I'm going to have to do
\~You can mend a tree faster than we can chop it down. \|
But I don't think you can heal an entire forest faster
\~Thanks! \|I've been working gathering these cabbages all
day. \|I haven't had a chance to get my shopping done.
\~Since you're not doing anything else, \.help me finish
up the harvest. \|We want to get it done before it starts
\~Just swing by the store and pick those things up, \.
\~Oh, \.hi \n[3]. \|I need a few supplies from the store, \.
but I'm too busy to head over myself. \|Can you get a few
\n[2] hands you a catalog and points out a few things.
\~Ask the shopkeep to charge it to my account.
\~Another day. \|We still haven't found a way out, \.but
the villagers are good people. \|Maybe this isn't the
\~I think \n[2] needed you for something. \|She's over at
the field, \.helping with the cabbage harvest.
